Description
jakarta.ws.rs.sse
Server-Sent Events related API.

    Description
    InboundSseEvent
    Inbound Server-sent event.
    OutboundSseEvent

    A builder class used for creating OutboundSseEvent instances.

    Server-Sent events broadcasting facility.
